title: Windows 8 Pro VL X86 X64 MULTI6 IE11 Dec2013

[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

  * Windows 8 Pro VL 32-bit
  * Windows 8 Pro VL 64-bit
   

[ Languages ]

  * de-DE  [German]  
  * en-US  [English]
  * es-ES  [Spanish]   
  * fr-FR  [French]

  * pt-BR  [Brazilian Portuguese]
 
   
[ CONTENTS ]

  Integrated / Pre-installed in Audit Mode:
  * .NET 2.0
  * .NET 3.5
  * .NET 4.5.1
  * Hotfixes - 2013-12-10


  Setupcomplete / Post-install:

  * KB890930
  * Defender Updates


  Optional software (web installers):

  * Adobe Reader
  * DirectX
  * Firefox
  * ImgBurn
  * iTunes
  * Notepad++
  * Skype
  * Spotify
  * uTorrent 


[ Features ]
  
  * install.wim compressed to recovery format (install.esd)
    which reduces the size. 


[ COMMENTS & ACTIVATION INFO ]

  Activation information:
  
  * A WPI-window will pop up in the last phase of the installation.
  * To skip activation, just click on "Exit".   
  * To Pre-Activate Windows, select "Activation". 
  * Click on "Begin Install" to execute the Pre-Activation.

 
  Software installation:
  
  * With the WPI-window you will have the option to install additional software.
  * All optional software uses web installers which requires connection to internet.
  * Simply select the software you wish to install and then "Begin install"

  
[ Installation ]

  * Create bootable USB, minimum 8GB, with Rufus (attached) 
    or burn to DVD DL at slow speed.
 

  Hope you will enjoy this release!

  Regards,
  Generation2
